page.title: 17Industries and Employment
page.content: The largest employer on Whittington Moor is Glass Bulbs Ltd. with 950 employees. They manufacture glass components for the lamp and lighting industries, glass tableware, lamp chimneys, lampshades and tubing for scientific & pharmaceutical purposes. Either directly or indirectly about 50% of output is exported. Dema Glass Ltd. decorates and dist- ributes glassware manufactured at Glass Bulbs Ltd. & employ 270 people. Lamp Caps Ltd. manufacture the aluminium and brass caps which go on the end of light bulbs and secures the bulb to its holder. Most of the caps are of the two-rivet type but some screw types are also made. They are sold to many factories in Britain and many are exported. There are 250 employees who work on the three-shift system.
